name: Burrowling
description: Small humanoid with high agility that thrives underground, exhibiting teamwork.
memorable: Effectively uses pack tactics for teamwork in combat.
goals: Overwhelm foes through teamwork and cooperative attacks.
strengths: High Dexterity enhances attack rolls and team effectiveness.
weaknesses: Low hit points make them vulnerable when isolated.
attacks: Uses Bite and Claw attacks during multiattack, and can also attack from a distance with a Sling.
most_powerful_ability: Pack Tactics grants advantage on attacks when allies are nearby.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, aiding in underground navigation.
skills: Has a Perception skill, making it adept at noticing hidden threats.
additional_information: Burrow Awareness enhances perceptual checks in groups.
Smaller size allows for agile movements.
Lawful neutral alignment indicates disciplined behavior.
Utilizes burrowing capabilities to navigate terrain.
test_queries: Burrowling tactics for teamwork and agility
dextrous creature thriving in dark environments
